items.sentence: I want to remind you that you have a 2:30 appointment.
We did many interesting things when we were in Boston.
We want Tom to play a song or two for us on his banjo.
Tom could\'ve given me some advice if he\'d wanted to.
Modern technology has made our lives more comfortable.
We have a lot of social problems to think about today.
What was the best present you received last Christmas?
Tom and I\'ve known each other since we were children.
Tom and Mary are both already in Boston, aren\'t they?
Tom doesn\'t have to tell Mary if he doesn\'t want to.
I can go a couple of days without eating if I have to.
How long have Tom and Mary been yelling at each other?
How long have you been working as a parking attendant?
How many hours of sleep did you really get last night?
How much longer do you think Tom will want to do that?
Tom asked me to help Mary put new frets on her guitar.
Next time, you should wear something more appropriate.
One good thing about winter is there are no mosquitos.
Tom works six days a week but only gets paid for five.
Tom doesn\'t want to do anything that will upset Mary.
